summary: Some local programs receive federal money to help survivors of domestic violence. We reported that the Department of Health and Human Services could do more to make sure these programs are accessible to people with disabilities. This is an "Easy Read" version of our report. Easy Read is a way some groups make their written information easier to understand. For example, Easy Read documents use...
title: SUPPLEMENTAL MATERIAL FOR GAO-24-106366: Federal Domestic Violence Assistance: HHS Should Assess Accessibility-Related Technical Assistance for Local Centers
